description: A remote cross site scripting vulnerability was identified in HPE iLO 3 all version prior to v1.88 and HPE iLO 4 all versions prior to v2.44.

product.name: HP Integrated Lights-Out 3 (iLO 3), HPE Integrated Lights-Out 4 (iLO 4)

enisaIdProduct.product_version: iLO 3 all version prior to v1.88,iLO 4 all versions prior to v2.44
